Flow.description:
This is a Record-Triggered Flow. It is designed to trigger the ALC Record Creation flow when a user drags a record to contracting started group in kanban view. This flow is triggered after a record is saved on the 'Candidate__c' object. It checks if the 'Status__c' field has been updated to 'Contracting Started'. If true, it updates the 'Offer_Accepted__c' field to 'True'. There are no subflows involved in this process.
Several objects and their fields worth mentioning. Below are the details (the format is given as: object_name - field_name: interaction) * Candidate__c - Status__c : The flow checks if this field is updated to 'Contracting Started'. * Candidate__c - Offer_Accepted__c : The flow updates this field to 'True' if the 'Status__c' condition is met.
